akn:section.akn:heading: Records of Commissioner; rules and regulations.

akn:content.akn:p: The office of the Commissioner shall be a public office, and the records, books, and papers thereof on file therein shall be public records of the District, except as the Commissioner for good reason may decide otherwise, or except as it may be provided otherwise herein.
The Commissioner may, in accordance with ยง 2-505, promulgate reasonable rules and regulations as are necessary to implement the provisions of this chapter.
